_description: This file defines which input files should be applied to which mockup files

_format.key: Input filename (can use any extension, e.g., '1.png' will match '1.jpeg')
_format.value: Array of mockup filenames from the 'mockup' folder

_notes: Keys match by basename (without extension): '1.png' matches '1.jpeg', '1.jpg', etc.
Values are arrays of mockup filenames (must exist in 'mockup' folder)
Each key-value pair creates N output files (N = array length)
